title: “Good Othering” – Helping Each Other Trust the Gold (2020-12-23)
itunes:title: “Good Othering” – Helping Each Other Trust the Gold
description: “Good Othering” – Helping Each Other Trust the Gold (2020-12-23) - One of the great gifts we can offer is being a mirror of goodness, reminding one another that we can trust our essential awareness, light and love. Because our conditioning is to fixate on flaws, “good othering” takes intention and practice. This talk explores how we can develop the habit of seeing goodness, and importantly, learn to communicate our appreciation and love to others.
